body.p: Some stakeholders suggested that one of the factors contributing to these difficulties was the lack of guidance on materiality in IFRS Standards, particularly on how entities should make materiality judgements about information disclosed in the notes to the financial statements. In the light of this feedback, the Board decided to provide further guidance. The aim of the Board is to promote a behavioural change in the way entities prepare their financial statements, encouraging a greater exercise of judgement when determining what information to include or not to include in those statements.
